trans-unit.source: A good summary of the various alignment algorithms can be found courtesy of Dr. Dannie Durand’s course on computational genomics here. The same document was copied locally to the C library repo in case this link ever breaks (link).

trans-unit.source: Binaries for Windows and OSX should be available via pip. Using pip on a Linux platform will first download the latest version of the parasail C library sources and then compile them automatically into a shared library. For an installation from sources, or to learn how the pip installation works on Linux, please read on.
trans-unit.target: Windows和OSX的二进制文件应该可以通过pip获得。在Linux平台上使用pip会首先下载最新版本的parasail C库源码,然后自动编译成一个共享库。如果想从源码安装,或者想了解pip在Linux上的安装方式,请继续阅读。

trans-unit.source: Daily, Jeff. (2016). Parasail: SIMD C library for global, semi-global, and local pairwise sequence alignments. BMC Bioinformatics, 17(1), 1-11. doi:10.1186/s12859-016-0930-z
trans-unit.target: Daily, Jeff. (2016). Parasail: SIMD C library for global, semi-global, and local pairwise sequence alignments. BMC Bioinformatics, 17(1), 1-11. doi:10.1186/s12859-016-0930-z

trans-unit.source: Gap open and extension penalties are specified as positive integers. When any of the algorithms open a gap, only the gap open penalty alone is applied.
trans-unit.target: 缺口打开和扩展惩罚被指定为正整数。当任何一种算法打开一个缺口时,只单独使用缺口打开惩罚。

trans-unit.source: If needed, please cite the following paper.
trans-unit.target: 如有需要,请引用以下论文。

trans-unit.source: It has been noted in literature that some performance can be gained by reusing the query sequence when using striped [Farrar, 2007] or scan [Daily, 2015] vector strategies. There is a special subset of functions that enables this behavior. For the striped and scan vector implementations only, a query profile can be created and reused for subsequent alignments. This can noticeably speed up applications such as database search.
trans-unit.target: It has been noted in literature that some performance can be gained by reusing the query sequence when using striped [Farrar, 2007] or scan [Daily, 2015] vector strategies. There is a special subset of functions that enables this behavior. For the striped and scan vector implementations only, a query profile can be created and reused for subsequent alignments. This can noticeably speed up applications such as database search.
非矢量化、可追溯的参考实现。

trans-unit.target: 可选择返回DP表或最后一行/一栏。

trans-unit.source: Optional, prepare query profile for a function that returns statistics. Stats require additional data structures to be allocated.
trans-unit.target: 可选,为返回统计数据的函数准备查询配置文件。统计数据需要分配额外的数据结构。

trans-unit.target: 如果在构建C库的过程中发现了zlib,Parasail可以解析FASTA、FASTQ和gzipped版本的文件。函数

trans-unit.source: Parasail supports accessing a SAM CIGAR string from a result. You must use a traceback-capable alignment function. Refer to the C interface description above for details on how to use a traceback-capable alignment function.
trans-unit.target: Parasail支持从结果中访问一个SAM CIGAR字符串。你必须使用一个可回溯的对齐函数。关于如何使用可回溯的对齐函数,请参考上面的C接口描述。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the bit size you select for creating the profile must match the bit size of the function you call. The example below uses a 16-bit profile and a 16-bit function.
trans-unit.target: Please note that the bit size you select for creating the profile must match the bit size of the function you call. The example below uses a 16-bit profile and a 16-bit function.

trans-unit.source: Python Bindings for the Parasail C Library

trans-unit.source: Required, select algorithm from table above.
Required, select solution width. ‘sat’ will allocate profiles for both 8- and 16-bit solutions.
trans-unit.target: Required, select solution width. ‘sat’ will allocate profiles for both 8- and 16-bit solutions.

trans-unit.source: Required, select solution width. ‘sat’ will attempt 8-bit solution but if overflow is detected it will then perform the 16-bit operation. Can be faster in some cases, though 16-bit is often sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Required, select solution width. ‘sat’ will attempt 8-bit solution but if overflow is detected it will then perform the 16-bit operation. Can be faster in some cases, though 16-bit is often sufficient.

trans-unit.source: Required, select vectorization strategy – striped is a good place to start, but scan is often faster for global alignment.
trans-unit.target: Required, select vectorization strategy – striped is a good place to start, but scan is often faster for global alignment.

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning and end of both sequences
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不对两个序列的开头和结尾处的空白进行惩罚。

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning and end of s1/query
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不惩罚s1/查询开头和结尾的空白。

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning and end of s2/database
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不对s2/数据库开头和结尾的空白进行惩罚

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning of s1/query
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不对s1/查询开头的空白进行惩罚

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning of s1/query and end of s2/database
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不惩罚s1/查询开头和s2/数据库结尾的缺口

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning of s2/database
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不对s2/数据库开头的空白进行惩罚

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at beginning of s2/database and end of s1/query
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不惩罚s2/数据库开始和s1/查询结束时的缺口

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at end of s1/query
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不对s1/查询末尾的空白进行惩罚

trans-unit.source: Semi-Global, do not penalize gaps at end of s2/database
trans-unit.target: 半全局性,不对S2/数据库末尾的空白进行惩罚。

trans-unit.source: The Python interface only includes bindings for the dispatching functions, not the low-level instruction set-specific function calls. The Python interface also includes wrappers for the various PAM and BLOSUM matrices included in the distribution.
trans-unit.target: Python 接口只包括调度函数的绑定,不包括低级指令集专用函数调用。Python接口还包括发行版中包含的各种PAM和BLOSUM矩阵的封装器。

trans-unit.source: The SSW library (https://github.com/mengyao/Complete-Striped-Smith-Waterman-Library) performs Smith-Waterman local alignment using SSE2 instructions and a striped vector. Its result provides the primary score, a secondary score, beginning and ending locations of the alignment for both the query and reference sequences, as well as a SAM CIGAR. There are a few parasail functions that emulate this behavior, with the only exception being that parasail does not calculate a secondary score.
trans-unit.target: The SSW library (https://github.com/mengyao/Complete-Striped-Smith-Waterman-Library) performs Smith-Waterman local alignment using SSE2 instructions and a striped vector. Its result provides the primary score, a secondary score, beginning and ending locations of the alignment for both the query and reference sequences, as well as a SAM CIGAR. There are a few parasail functions that emulate this behavior, with the only exception being that parasail does not calculate a secondary score.

trans-unit.source: The bdist_wheel target will first look for the shared library. If it exists, it will happily install it as package data. Otherwise, the latest parasail master branch from github will be downloaded, unzipped, configured, made, and the shared library will be copied into the appropriate location for package data installation.
trans-unit.target: bdist_wheel目标将首先寻找共享库。如果它存在,它会很高兴地将其作为包数据安装。否则,将从github下载最新的parasail master分支,解压、配置、制作,然后将共享库复制到合适的位置,进行包数据安装。

trans-unit.source: The downloading and building of the parasail C library can be skipped if you set the environment variable PARASAIL_SKIP_BUILD to any value prior to running setup.py or pip install. At runtime during import, the parasail bindings will search for the parasail C library first in the package data location, then in standard system locations, and lastly by searching through the environment variables PARASAIL_LIBPATH, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH, and PATH.. For verbose output during this search, set PARASAIL_VERBOSE=1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行setup.py或pip install之前将环境变量PARASAIL_SKIP_BUILD设置为任意值,就可以跳过parasail C库的下载和构建。在导入过程中的运行时,parasail绑定将首先在包的数据位置搜索parasail C库,然后在标准系统位置搜索,最后通过环境变量PARASAIL_LIBPATH、LD_LIBRARY_PATH、DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH和PATH...来搜索。为了在搜索过程中得到详细的输出,设置PARASAIL_VERBOSE=1。

trans-unit.source: The parasail python bindings are based on ctypes. Unfortunately, best practices are not firmly established for providing cross-platform and user-friendly python bindings based on ctypes. The approach with parasail-python is to install the parasail shared library as “package data” and use a relative path from the parasail/__init__.py in order to locate the shared library.
trans-unit.target: The parasail python bindings are based on ctypes. Unfortunately, best practices are not firmly established for providing cross-platform and user-friendly python bindings based on ctypes. The approach with parasail-python is to install the parasail shared library as “package data” and use a relative path from the parasail/__init__.py in order to locate the shared library.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way of installing is to use the latest version available via pip.
trans-unit.target: 推荐的安装方式是使用通过pip提供的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: The second approach is to let the setup.py script attempt to download and compile the parasail C library for you using the configure script that comes with it. This happens as a side effect of the bdist_wheel target.
trans-unit.target: 第二种方法是让setup.py脚本尝试使用自带的configure脚本为你下载并编译parasail C库。这种情况是作为bdist_wheel目标的副作用发生的。

trans-unit.source: There are many functions within the parasail library, but most are variations of the familiar main algorithms. The following table describes the main algorithms and the shorthand name used for the function.
trans-unit.target: parasail库中有许多函数,但大多数都是熟悉的主要算法的变体。下表描述了主要算法和函数的简写名称。

trans-unit.source: There are two approaches currently supported. First, you can compile your own parasail shared library using one of the recommended build processes described in the parasail C library README.md, then copy the parasail.dll (Windows), libparasail.so (Linux), or libparasail.dylib (OSX) shared library to parasail-python/parasail – the same folder location as parasasail-python/parasail/__init__.py.
trans-unit.target: There are two approaches currently supported. First, you can compile your own parasail shared library using one of the recommended build processes described in the parasail C library README.md, then copy the parasail.dll (Windows), libparasail.so (Linux), or libparasail.dylib (OSX) shared library to parasail-python/parasail – the same folder location as parasasail-python/parasail/__init__.py.

trans-unit.source: There is one version of banded global alignment available. Though it is not vectorized, it might still be faster than using other parasail global alignment functions, especially for large sequences. The function signature is similar to the other parasail functions with the only exception being
trans-unit.target: 有一个版本的带状全局对准。虽然它不是矢量化的,但它仍然可能比使用其他parasail全局对齐函数更快,特别是对于大序列。函数签名与其他 parasail 函数类似,唯一的例外是

trans-unit.source: This package contains Python bindings for parasail. Parasail is a SIMD C (C99) library containing implementations of the Smith-Waterman (local), Needleman-Wunsch (global), and semi-global pairwise sequence alignment algorithms.
trans-unit.target: This package contains Python bindings for parasail. Parasail is a SIMD C (C99) library containing implementations of the Smith-Waterman (local), Needleman-Wunsch (global), and semi-global pairwise sequence alignment algorithms.

trans-unit.source: To make it easier to find the function you’re looking for, the function names follow a naming convention. The following will use set notation {} to indicate a selection must be made and brackets [] to indicate an optional part of the name.
trans-unit.target: To make it easier to find the function you’re looking for, the function names follow a naming convention. The following will use set notation {} to indicate a selection must be made and brackets [] to indicate an optional part of the name.

trans-unit.source: To run the testsuite use the unittest runner.
